text: Edward James de Souza (born 4 September 1932) is a British character actor.Interview with Edward de Souza kaldorcity.com. Originally published in Celestial Toyroom issue 384. He retired in 2014. He Colin Grimshaw in the soap opera Coronation Street from 2008 to 2009. In 1977, he played Sheik Hosein in the James Bond movie The Spy Who Loved Me. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1932 births Category:Living people Category:British movie actors Category:British stage actors Category:British television actors Category:British voice actors Category:Actors from Yorkshire Category:People from Kingston upon Hull
title: Edward de Souza
